# metadata

**Instance Property**

An array of metadata items for all metadata identifiers for which a value is available.

## Declaration

```swift
var metadata: [AVMetadataItem] { get }
```

## Discussion

You can filter the metadata items by language using the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/metadataItems(from:filteredAndSortedAccordingToPreferredLanguages:)] method, or by identifier with the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem/metadataItems(from:filteredByIdentifier:)] method.
title: metadata
